import React, {useState} from 'react' import classNames from 'classnames' import List from './List' import moduleName from '../assets/img/close.svg' const AddList = ({colors}) =>{ const [popUp , showPopUp] = useState(false ) const [selectedColor , selectColor] = useState(colors[0]["id"]) return
showPopUp(!popUp)} items= {[ { className: 'add-list__button', icon: , name:'Add list' } ]}isRemovable={false}/> {popUp &&
    { colors.map((i) => (
  • selectColor(i.id)} key={i.id} className= {classNames("add-list__circle", i.name, {'active': (i.id===selectedColor)} )}>
    • )) }
}
} export default AddList;
